remarks: Value of isomorphism H for a lattice ` K ` at an atom not under ` W ` . (Contributed by NM, 27-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dihvalcqat.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihvalcqat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dihvalcqat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihvalcqat.j $e |- J = ( ( DIsoC ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihvalcqat.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihvalcqat $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) ) -> ( I ` Q ) = ( J ` Q ) ) $.
